title: Sen. Kevin McCallister, Ranch Filled Stocking 12.16.19
itunes:title: Sen. Kevin McCallister, Ranch Filled Stocking 12.16.19
description:
In episode 536, Jack and Miles are joined by Bechdel Cast co-host Caitlin Durante to discuss Cam'ron not believing in dinosaurs, Mitch McConnell claiming he will let Trump's lawyers dictate the impeachment trial, social media and television leading to depression and anxiety in teens, Pepsi Cafe, fast food holiday promotions, the Game of Thrones creators finding their new project, the Home Alone reboot, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Our fourth annual #12DaysOfPodcasts starts tonight: Killa Cam stops by for a wide ranging, dynamic, hilarious, personal and pre-historic conversation.
  2. McConnell indicates he’ll let Trump’s lawyers dictate Trump’s impeachment trial
  3. Social media and television use — but not video games — predict depression and anxiety in teens
  4. Pepsi Will Help Americans Tackle That Afternoon Slump with New Pepsi Café
  5. Nothing Says Christmas Like … a KFC Fried-Chicken Fire?
  6. DUNKIN' DONUTS LAUNCHES LIMITED EDITION HOLIDAY MERCHANDISE ON ONLINE POP-UP SHOP
  7. Taco Bell's Scented 'Crunchwrapping Paper' Sold Out Immediately
  8. MCDONALD’S IS SELLING MERCHANDISE MADE FOR ITS BIGGEST FANS, JUST IN TIME FOR THE HOLIDAYS
  9. Popeyes serving up ugly Christmas chicken sandwich sweater. How fast will it sell out?
  10. From KFC-scented firelogs to Taco Bell wrapping paper, why are this year's food-related holiday promotions so bonkers?
  11. The ‘Game Of Thrones’ Showrunners Have Found Their Next Project After Bailing On A ‘Star Wars’ Trilogy
  12. ‘Home Alone’ Reboot Taps ‘Jojo Rabbit’s’ Archie Yates, Ellie Kemper, Rob Delaney (EXCLUSIVE)
  13. New ‘Home Alone’ Reboot Details: What We Know About the New Mischievous Main Character
  14. America's Favourite Child Soldier: 'Home Alone,' 25 Years Later
  15. WATCH: KAYTRANADA - Puff Lah (Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
